Title: Relates to establishing a reduction of federal adjusted gross income, for state personal income tax purposes, for student loan interest payments made by taxpayers
Summary: Establishes a reduction of federal adjusted gross income, for state personal income tax purposes, for student loan interest payments made by taxpayers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a reduction of federal adjusted gross income, for state personal income tax purposes, for student loan interest payments made by taxpayers
